name: Arcana Force V - The Hierophant
text:
When this card is Summoned, toss a coin:
Heads - You can Normal Summon/Set 2 "Arcana Force" monsters in addition to your Normal Summon/Set.
Tails - (Quick Effect): You can target 1 other monster on the field; Return both this card and that card to the hand, then, you can Special Summon 1 "Arcana Force" monster with a different name from your hand.
